name: Maritime LNG Plattform e.V.
goal: The “Maritime LNG Plattform e.V.” is a cross-sector coalition of industrial/shipping companies, port authorities and German/international initiatives with nearly 100 members and partners. It is aimed at creating a more sustainable shipping sector with less pollutant emissions through establishing the use of LNG (Liquefied Natural Gas) as a marine fuel. With offices in Hamburg and Berlin, the coalition platform campaigns for improving the framework conditions for the use of LNG in shipping in Germany and beyond.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Transport
